MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA8 postcode area of Widnes, affecting properties in Heathfield Park and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.55am. Our engineers are on their way to the local area to investigate the loss of supplies and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2.30pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.46am on 29th April 2021.
